scripts.build: asc build/$SC_NAME.ts --use abort=build/$SC_NAME/myabort --target release --outFile build/$SC_NAME.wasm && wasmv1_transform build/$SC_NAME.wasm add
scripts.build_windows: asc build/%SC_NAME%.ts --use abort=build/%SC_NAME%/myabort --target release --outFile build/%SC_NAME%.wasm && wasmv1_transform build/%SC_NAME%.wasm add
